One quite summer day, Max was sulking in his playroom. He was upset about his height once more. Even though last time he wished to be big it got out of control. "I'm sick of being so little, I wanna get big and be a giant again", Max said. Max decided to read a book about the magic things in Dragon Land to try and take his mind off being upset over his short stature. Max got the book out of his drawer and began to read. The things in the book were pretty standard, magic tees, magic holes, (ect). Max was about to close the book out of boredom when a certain page caught his attention


The page was about a magical growth potion that was meant to make plants in dragon land grow bigger, it said nothing about the results for a human child. Max was curious at this. "A growth potion wow that's cool, I wonder what will happen if I try", said Max. He continued to read the page, the book said the ingredients for the potion were in Dragon Land. "That's so cool, I gotta make that potion so I can get bigger", Max said excitedly. Max took out the magic spell and said the rhyme to teleport to dragon land. Max quickly arrived in Dragon Land with the book in his hands, so he could follow the clues to find the ingredients.

Soon Max gathered all the necessary ingredients he took a empty bottle from Ketzel, without him knowing, dropped them in and began to mix the ingredients. The ingredients mixed together to form a Purple liquid. Max looked at the book and the recommended dosage was only one drop. Max frowned and said "What one drop, forget that I'm gonna drink the whole thing!" Max drank the potion down to the last drop and let out a belch. Max blushed, covered his mouth and said "Well excuse me", he said quietly. Max waited for the potion to take effect, but nothing happened.

"No fair it didn't work, I should have never undone the wishing spell to be big", Max grumbled. Max sadly held the book in his hand and said the rhyme to go back home. He was home in a flash and tossed his book to the side and went back to sulking. Soon, Max fell asleep completely unaware that the potion actually worked and was also unaware of the upcoming events!

1152222222222222222222211.content:
A/N: Credit to Giantsboy for inspiration for this. Also shrinking is only used in this to return to normal size so hope that doesn't violate a rule.

After the ban on superheroes was lifted a few months ago, the city of Metroville has become a city of safety and peace. All crime was wiped out of the city, with the combined efforts of Mr. Incredible, Elastigirl, Frozone, and a few out heroes that have come out of hiding like Voyd. With all the good news, you'd think there wouldn't be anyone who was displeased with all the peace.

"I hate this!"

Well then you haven't met Dash Parr.

The blond boy groaned in annoyance while constant giggles echoed all around him. After crime was wiped out of Metroville, other villains and crooks have been terrorizing other nearby cites and towns, thinking it'd be easier to get their way there with less heroes residing there. Unfortunately for them, Winston Deavor was immediately notified of any illegal activity and contacted Dash's parents right away, since he trusted them the most to handle any dire situation. To his credit, he was right to due so, as no petty crook or super-villain could stop the two, as Frozone and other superheroes also accompanied them most of the time. You'd think Dash would be happy, and to a certain extent he was, about his parents being famous for their heroics.

Dash sighed, as he got a cookie from the jar and waved it in the air, thinking about how he got into this situation to begin with.

A week earlier...

"What do you mean I have to watch Jack-Jack!?"

Mr. Incredible looked at his son with a raised eyebrow, as he stared back with a 'Are you crazy!?' sort of look.

"Don't be like that Dash. You know your mother and I are busy nowadays with the crime wave going on in other cities and towns nearby. And your sister is still trying to get closer with that Tony kid." Bob had a slight grimace on his face saying that, some guilt about what he caused months ago lingering in his mind. "Besides, you're going to have to learn to take care of him eventually when you and your younger brother get older."

Dash loved his brother, he really did, but after how poorly last time went on that ship, he didn't want to try again out of fear of having Jack-Jack hate him, and because it was so dull of a task to him. "No way! Last time I couldn't calm him down and-"

"And that's why you're going to take care of him, You won't improve in taking care of him unless you try." Bob could certainly empathize with Dash though, having a little taste of how hard it can be to take care of Jack-Jack months ago.

"Okay fine, but what did you mean about me taking care of my brother when I get older?"

"It's like your father said Dash..." Both males turned to see Elastigirl enter the room in uniform. "Jack-Jack is going to start relying on you as your get older. Little brothers tend to look up to their older sibling, more so if they are the same gender, and Jack-Jack seems to like being around you a lot. You feel the same way right?"

Dash frequently plays with his baby brother in the yard, specifically with Jack-Jack's eye laser-power, and they both laugh while doing so. The boy would be lying if he said he didn't know what her point was and conceded with a grimace, "Alright fine, I'll give it another shot. But I wanna fight crime with you two!"

Helen had a gentle smile only a mother can give their children, "I know sweetie, but your father and I told you, we don't want you or your sister involved in crime-fighting just yet. You're still young and I can't bare the thought of something happening to my first-born son..."

"Bleh! Quit being so mushy and sad mom! I'll babysit him if you just stop!"

Helen laughed and nodded, before turning to her husband with a serious expression. "Winston called. Couple of villains showed up a few cities over. Poisonous gases already enveloping a quarter of it!"

"That doesn't sound good. Alright, let's go to the car! What city?"

"I tell you more details on the way! Bye Dash, we love you!" Dash waved them goodbye as both parents ran downstairs,

Presently...

Dash mused to himself out loud while seeing his brother teleport in front of him to eat the cookie, "I miss the action. What good are superpowers if you can't use them? Right Jack-Jack?"

The youngest sibling garbled in agreement, before going back to eating his cookie. Dash looked at his brother and thought on how well he improved in taking care of him. The first time, the house was left a scorched mess. Dash quickly learned that heavy music was something Jack despised, as it brought out his worst side, his fire powers and demon form. He was found with scratches and scorch marks all over, leading to them wearing their superhero uniforms when Dash babysat Jack-Jack to control the situation a bit more. The next time wasn't as bad, but a few things were still left destroyed due to mozart music being something Bob recommended. The third time, Dash succeeded in kept Jack-Jack behaved by having him play tag.

"That's not something I'm doing again..."

Jack-Jack tagged him every time by hitting him with his eye lasers to make him flinch from the slight pain, and then teleport out out the dimension, making it take more than 10 minutes for him to return, much to Dash's frustration. Though, Dash did enjoy his newest method to keep him and his brother entertained. He got Jack-Jack to make a few tiny buildings with his new creation power he developed a few weeks ago and using Dash's old toys, they'd play Godzilla with the city, lasers and all. It was certainly fun to pretend to be the bad guy for a change.

That got Dash thinking about something. "It'd be fun to be a giant and rampage throughout the city. I could do anything I wanted and no one could stop me..." Dash grinned at the thought, but shook his head and dismissed it when he thought about his family. Not only could they possibly stop him, but he didn't want to hurt them or worse due to his bond with him. "Maybe if they couldn't get involved somehow..."

Dash thought had a thought. Jack-Jack could manipulate his own size, like he did on Deavor's cruise ship. That made Dash wonder if he could use it to change other people's sizes too. "And without the fat..." Dash added with a grimace. Some people liked being bulky, as some students in school pointed out to him, but he couldn't imagine himself being plump. He was also curious if Jack-Jack could alter his size without becoming bulky either. He also knew that his brother listened to him a lot more now, possibly as thanks for keeping him entertained and because he liked Dash more. That in mind...

"Say little brother, can you make yourself giant without making yourself fat?" The baby giggled and nodded, as he began to concentrate and Dash's eyes widened in realization, quickly dashing out to the yard and place the super-baby down just as he grew larger than their house, with no increased in body fat, his giggles rumbling like thunder. Covering his ears with a wince, the blond yelled up, "Okay, you can shrink down now!" After doing so, Dash was looking at him in awe, before asking him to try to do the same to him. Nodding while giggling, the baby concentrated and the 10-year-old looked around in amazement, seeing everything become smaller until the house came up to his knee. He was tempted to have some fun at the size right there and then, but quickly remember his parents and how he might make the news in a few seconds if anyone saw him like that, so he whispered for Jack-Jack to shrink him and the baby did so, going back down to his normal size with mixed disappointment and slight relief.

"If only there was a place I could rampage as a giant without my mom, dad and sister getting in the way..." As if understanding his brother's wishes and wanting to please him like he's done for him, the infant concentrated and Dash yelped seeing them both started to warp out of their own dimension. When space stopped distorting around him, Dash took a look at his surroundings and saw that they were no longer in Metroville, but on the outskirts of another city entirely! Wanting to know what world they were in, Dash used his power to zoom inside the city and steal a few newspapers before going back to his brother, who laughed joyfully at his return. The newspapers told him nothing about the world he was in other than the fact that their were no superheroes in it, as nothing in the news talked about them, not even a mention. Glancing between his brother and the newspaper, a grin slowly formed on Dash's freckled face before he picked up his brother and hugged him in joy.

"Oh Jack-Jack! You're the best baby brother ever!" The baby giggled in joy and returned the hug with a delighted smile, before Dash placed him down and grinned, thinking about all the fun he was gonna have with this helpless city. He looked at his brother and the thought of his sibling joining him entered his mind. After a bit, Dash came to a conclusion and said to his brother with a mischievous smirk...

choices: take things slow. Why not just enjoy his size difference a bit?
continue using their powers. It is a lot of fun after all!
115222222222222222222221122.content:
Dash immediately regretted his choice in words. His baby brother made an excited garble and immediately started shooting lasers all of the city. It was fun to watch for Dash, watching the tiny people flee from the deadly lasers coming from the giant baby's eyes, but those lasers were cutting through multiple buildings at once each time Jack-Jack fired them. At this point, Dash would have very little left to toy with if Jack-Jack burnt everything to ashes right off the bat!

And yet...It occurred to the ten-year-old that the city they were in wasn't the only city. Heck, even if it was the only one on this version of Earth, Dash figured Jack-Jack could simply take them to another universe and they could have some more fun there. The excited giggles and clapping his brother did from his fun also made it hard for the older sibling to deny him for Dash's own selfishness. So, he stood there and watched for now, encouraging his little brother with an interested grin. "Good job little brother! Now aim for those ones!" Seeing where his older brother was pointing, the baby nodded and fired them right at the skyscraper, both giants watching debris fall and people fleeing not to get crushed to no avail, some blood visible from the wreckage, as both young boys laughed from their fun.

As Dash did a glance around and saw the city almost completely destroyed by this point, Jack-Jack felt something firing at his leg, curiously glancing down to see some police officers shooting at him in desperation. The bullets didn't hurt Jack that much, but after a while, the area he was being shot at began to sting, similar to the discomfort some would have of being bit by a bug. Jack-Jack got annoyed and leered down at them while making some angered garble noises. The officers should've back down upon seeing this gigantic baby getting nothing more than annoyed by their constant shooting. Instead, they panicked and fired closer to his face, one nearly hitting him in the eye. Understandably, Jack-Jack lost patience and shook a bit before his entire body set on fire, something that made his older brother jump slightly in shock, now paying attention to what was going on.

Dash saw the officers firing rounds of bullets at Jack-Jack and leered down annoyed. "Hey! Stop shooting at my baby brother you annoying pests!" As a response to now angering the much bigger giant of the two, some of them changed focus and shot towards Dash, hitting his legs, stomach and some each reached his chin, while some kept focus on the raging fire baby, who began stomping around in blind fury. Now even more annoyed, Dash simply use his powers and in the next second, all of the officers found themselves in the grip of the blond giant, some gulping in fear at the sheer size difference. The massive blue irises of the giant glaring down at their tiny, helpless forms didn't help either. Dash tightened his grip slightly and the tiny officers screamed in pain, their weapons crumbling from the severe pressure. Opening his fist to see their destroyed weapons, Dash grinned in satisfaction, while the tiny officers whimpered or shook with intense fear knowing they were now completely defenseless. "Now what to do with you little bugs? Hmm..."

Dash didn't get much time to think of a punishment before his brothers enraged screams of anger brought his attention back to the flaming infant, who was jumping around as the demon-like form he had, setting fire to undestroyed sections of the city, as well as sections that were destroyed, where some survivors or people who fled earlier met a slow, agonizing end. Deciding his priority was to calm down his enraged brother, Dash glanced back down the tiny officers and said with a smirk, "I'll deal with you ants later. Try not to move too much in your prison in the meantime!" They didn't know what Dash meant until he opened the waistband of his speedo, giving them a glimpse of the boy's gigantic moons before dropping them in and closing the waistband, giggling slightly from them movement he felt back there. "Sorry bugs~ Not much places to carry you since I only have my mask and speedos left!" And Dash didn't feel like confining them in his front side either, fearing their movements might tickle him and that wouldn't help when trying to soothe his little brother, (though that would prove to be a mute point in a minute). Not wasting any more time on them for now, Dash sped back to his brother.

Upon seeing the city set ablaze though, Dash realized he should put out the fire first, as he didn't want to test if he had immunity to fire at his size at the moment, and he felt his captives possibly dying from the heat would be no fun. He also didn't have that special controller or the suit to simply put out the flames, adding a mental note to remind Edna to make new sets of both upon getting back home later. So, he remembered a scene he saw from the news one point when growing up, involving another hero with speed powers using it to put out a fire by running enough circles around it to create a mini cyclone that extinguished the flames. Grinning in excitement of being able to recreate that, Dash wasted no time and created a cyclone in a matter of seconds, his brother also extinguished with the flames, but sent flying in the air from the strong gust of the cyclone, giggling from the fun he was having. Dash paled a bit seeing his brother being sent flying and stood out to catch him when he began falling back down. However, Jack-Jack simply used his levitating powers to avoid possible injury, floating to his brother and giggling happily in his brother's arms. Dash sighed in relief and gently smiled at his younger brother, patting his head.

"Having fun so far Jack-Jack?" The baby giggled and nodded, enjoying the comfort from his older sibling. Dash smiled, glad to be able to entertain his troublesome little brother without as much difficulty this time. He also slightly felt a pang of joy in seeing his little brother slowly liking him more and more as they spent time together. Thinking back to the foolish officers that dared mess with him and his little brother, Dash frowned slightly and glanced down at Jack-Jack, "Sorry little bro. I've should've made sure you didn't get to that point of anger in the first place." The baby made some sort of garble that Dash somehow felt said not to worry about it. At the thought of the tiny officers, Dash glanced back to his rump and grinned. "But don't worry little brother, Your big brother took care of those meanies for you~" He patted his butt saying that and couldn't help giggling from their struggles, his brother joining in.

Dash then noticed the debris scattered everything from his cyclone, which dispersed by now, and got an idea. Grinning, he lifted his brother on his shoulder and said while glancing at the destroyed city,"Well this city's done for. Let's move onto the next! I've got a fun idea I want to test out! Hold on tight Jack-Jack!" The baby nodded and held on, as the giants reached the next city within the span of a minute. In Dash's hurry, he unknowingly sped through a couple of villages, footprints and an immensely strong gale of wind being all that was left of them. Upon reaching the next city, Dash put his brother down and explained his idea to him, ignoring the faint screams of panic coming from said city nearby, "Jack-Jack, do you think you could use your powers to send my cyclone towards the city?" The baby nodded and Dash grinned in excitement, patting his little brother once more and then getting started.

After creating the cyclone, Jack-Jack's eyes narrowed in concentration, his blue eyes glowing slightly as he used telekinesis to grab the cyclone and then sent it towards the city, letting go off his hold and giggling as he and his older brother watched the chaos unfold. The citizens themselves were already panicking from just the sight of the two massive giants, but their hysterics increased upon seeing the cyclone now going towards them. Many panicked and fled, while some few were frozen in fear, as the cyclone began ripping buildings and parts of the street off the ground, people getting hit by flying debris and dying upon impact. Those swept up were later flung into buildings or destroyed sections from the cyclones path, nothing but blood and corpses left upon impact. Dash and Jack-Jack just laughed from the fun of being able to do all of this without much effort, (Well less than usual when fighting criminals). "Awesome! Now make it move around in a circle Jack-Jack!" The baby giggled and complied, moving it around while laughing at the show he was getting.

As the faint sounds of destruction and screams of people rang through the air in the background, Dash began thinking to himself about how they were going about this. This was certainly fun messing around with their powers at this size, but a part of him was curious about doing something he'd otherwise hate doing: taking things slow. All of his life, he hated going slow at anything, be it gymnastics, schoolwork, or eating for that matter. However, like Television, Dash could see the value in taking his time with his new size. After all, he could do anything he wanted without his parents or sister here to stop him or his brother, if the slightly wriggling against his cheeks were anything to go by. He now felt like deciding if he should continue using them powers and destroying everything in a rapid, yet fun matter, or take it slowly and just enjoy messing with the tiny people at their size. After thinking about it long enough for the city to be utterly destroyed by the cyclone, he decided to...
115222222222222222222221122.title: To Have Fun with Superpowers

crush them in creatively cruel ways.
1152222222222222222222211221.content:
"Hey Jack-Jack..." The giggling baby turned his attention to his brother curiously, as said boy gave him a gentle smile."As fun as this is, I think we should take it slow. I wanna mess with these tiny people without completely destroying them. Like, it'd be fun to make them worship us like the gods we are to them, wouldn't it?" Jack-Jack nodded happily, somewhat understanding what his brother was saying as Dash continued, "We could do so many mean and gross things to them, or humiliate them with our size." Dash made a toothy grin as his brother let out more excited noises, clearly interested in what Dash was saying."We could even punish those that dare defy us by putting them in your speedo! You could have some butt toys of your own~" Dash quickly turned around and let Jack-Jack see the outlines of the poor tiny officers trapped in his speedo, making Jack-Jack giggle. The thought of it excited him and the baby nodded eagerly, want to try everything his brother was telling him, (everything he understood anyhow). Having successfully convinced his brother to dial down the destruction, Dash picked up his brother and carried him on his shoulders once more, running towards the next metropolis he could find, running through the ocean in doing so and on another continent entirely.

To everyone in the next the two were now standing yards away from, it was initially an odd sight. They saw a flesh-colored blur at first that was rapidly getting closer until a few seconds later and the two part-naked giant youths were standing outside their city, a strong windstorm following from the speed Dash carried. Now, the citizens didn't know what to make of it, some thought they had to be imagining things, as there was no logical way this was possible. But they were about to find out that it was indeed real, and they were powerless to stop either two.

Dash noticed the windstorm his speed gave and looked amazed by it, as debris flew all over the city, somehow with no casualties so far, though there were injuries. "Cool! I can even cause that much damage by just using my speed alone!" That sentence immediately caused panic for all of the citizens of the metropolis, now terrified of the 10-year-old giant's interest in their suffering caused by him. The smirk he sent their way only increased that wariness and police were immediately sent to keep them out, (or attempt anyway), Meanwhile, Dash placed his brother down and decided to give his little brother an example of what he meant by taking things slow. "Alright Jack-Jack, watch your big brother give an example!" With a nod and giggle as a response, the mischievous giant boy stomped over to the city, looking down curiously at the barricade of police officers just outside the city.

"Attention giant kid! Stop your advancement towards our city and tell us your purpose on coming here!" Curious as to how these officers weren't terrified of him like the ones he had confined, Dash decided to play along for a moment or two. "Oh really? Well what if I don't want to? How are you bugs gonna stop me?" In response, the faint sound (to him) of multiple guns cocking at him filled the air."Then we will stop your advancements by force!" Dash laughed at that, his thunderous laughter making them cover their ears. The ten-year-old could think of multiple ways to deal with these tiny officers, but decided to simply crush them underneath his foot to send a message to the thousands of remaining citizens: Don't fuck with me, or else! With a toothy grin, Dash lifted his foot, which terrified the police officers and made them shoot at the lowering gigantic sole, only succeeding in stinging the boy slightly. The feeling of them going splat underneath his foot with a thunderous boom and blood soaking underneath it more than made up for the minor discomfort to Dash, feeling his ego swell from the power-trip he was now starting of have.

Any citizen nearby who saw the carnage immediately shrieked in fear and ran away from him, as Dash laughed at the gory mess. "Seriously, that was your best? What a shame...Oh well, first of many!" With that, the giant took his first step into the city, flattening a couple of buildings with his step and crushing a few unlucky citizens inside of them that were either paralyzed with fear, or heavy sleepers. Dash laughed from the carnage he caused, loving the feeling of being bad for a change! Seeing a group of nearby citizens that were frozen in fear, Dash deciding to try that worshiping idea he had, glancing over to his brother and calling him over. "Hey Jack-Jack, come closer!" Making a happy garble, the baby nodded as his slowly walked towards his brother, stepping over a few buildings on his way and giggling from the feeling of crushing such puny structures underneath his pudgy feet.

"Hear me tiny people! Me and my baby brother have come here to crush your puny little city underneath us, along with each and every single one of you pathetic bugs!" The demeaning from the giant boy and fear of his intentions made some of those cowering piss their pants in terror, as Jack-Jack listened to his brother with curiosity."However, we might be willing to let some of you live if you please us well enough! Any one of you that fails to listen or please us will either be punished or crush beneath us!" Paling at the grinning giant's terms, the majority of the tiny people plead to be spared, while a few began to flee, only to end up in Dash's fist a millisecond later. "Alright, those that what to be spared can start be rubbing our feet! Oh, and for you bugs that just tried to escape..." Dash smirked at them and then glanced at his curious brother."Hey little brother, want those butt toys of your now?" The baby's smile widened and the terrified people in Dash's fist paled at their sentencing, inwardly cursing themselves for not joining the rest in pleasing these two if it meant freedom.

Both giants sat down, Dash more gently as to not crushed his own prisoners just yet. Jack-Jack just plopped down and crushed multiple small apartment complexes underneath his tush, giggling from the strange feeling of liquid soaking through his speedo and onto his tush. Dash ended up crushing more buildings underneath his butt due to him being older and bigger, giggling as well from the feeling, while the spectators in front just watched in horror, some feeling sick from the sight. Dash then leaned closer to his brother's backside and opened the waistband of his speedo, dangling the screaming people in his giant fist over the gigantic cheeks before dropping them in and closing the waistband with a grin, one that was immediately wiped off once Jack-Jack grunted and the sound of wind breaking filled the air follow by a horrendous stench, one that quickly entered Dash's nose and make him recoil in disgust."Ugh! Jack-Jack, did you have to let one rip right when I was there!? God, mom's beans don't help with that either!" The baby just laughed and pointed at his brother, having a bit of fun messing with him and also from feeling the tiny people thrash against his buttcheeks, no doubt suffering some horrible form of hell in there.

Getting over it rather quickly, Dash momentarily thought of how rank his might be from last night's beans and grinned, deciding to try that out later just of the sake of it, maybe get even with Jack-Jack if he could. He then turned his attention to the coughing tiny people in front of him, as the smell still lingered in the air faintly."Well what are you bugs waiting for? You still have some feet to rub!" The tiny people saw Dash frowning at them and gulped, not wanting to suffer what just happened to those unfortunate neighbors of theirs. They immediately began rubbing the blood-soaked and rubble-littered soles of the giant youths, groaning from the stench coming off from them. They only found some sort of solace in the fact that it didn't stink as bad as Jack-Jack's toot, the stench slowly faded as there continued to rub, making both giant boys smile and Dash even groaned in pleasure from the massage.

After a while, the two got bored from the massages and Dash got up slowly, making those worshiping run away a bit to avoid being crushed. Jack-Jack followed his brother's lead and his worshipers also fled a bit. Dash then felt his stomach growl, and it wasn't for release. He glanced at the tiny people below him and a toothy grin plastered onto his face, as he picked them up and shrugged."Sorry, I know I said I'd let you live, but I feel a bit peckish and I'm curious to see what you guys taste like!" lifting his hand holding them, he brought the screaming and pleading group to his mouth and opened, throwing them in unannounced and swish them around a bit while tasting them. They didn't all taste awful he had to admit, though those that pissed their pants made him wince and he didn't to see if their blood might wash out that slight unpleasant taste. So, he began to chew them to bits and those muffled shrieks got louder for a second before slowly dying down to just the sound of chewing. To his relief, the blood did wash out that bad taste and he swallowed with a sigh, let out a burp afterwards. Jack-Jack deciding to do the same, but ended up swallowing them whole due to his lack of teeth, feeling content about the taste.

Dash now was wondering if he should continue making them worship him and his brother, or if they could maybe try crushing them in unique, cruel and possibly gross ways. He quickly decided to...

11522222222222222222222112211.title: continue making them all worship the two giants.

They find another world, but they have giant-sized company...
115222222222222222222221122112.content:
"Continue destroying the city!"

At least, that was the plan at first...

The city did end up destroyed, quite brutally if the wide-eyed ten-year-old had to admit. Dash was honestly a bit frightened by Jack-Jack's potential at times. The sight of him telekinetically making the tiny people's heads explode and moving their corpses around like puppets made Dash shudder at the thought of his baby brother doing that to him or the rest of the family one day from his temper tantrums. It was even more scary when he realized that Jack-Jack is too young to properly understand the concept of death, despite his abnormal intellect. The ten-year old himself recently learned about it. That didn't stop him from snuffing out the poor tiny people underneath them like bugs though, the power-trip alone was far too enjoyable!

Dash mused to himself while travelling through dimensions of what he did to them. He gave them quite a lot of scares before putting them out of their misery, weather it was swishing them around in his mouth, sitting on them with not enough force to crush them completely (though enough to break every bone in their body), squishing them against his stinky armpits (Jack-Jack's reeked of soot), or just making them beg for mercy underneath his toe. And then there were those poor little villages that had been force to endure the full aftermath of their mom's beans, the only form of mercy shown from the laughing children being they didn't ended up 'wasted'. Each moment of their torment and the haunting shrieks that rang upon ending their lives made a dark grin form on the child's face, one he quickly dismissed whenever Jack-Jack looked towards his direction.

Maybe it had something to do with school bullies making Dash feel pathetic, not being to use his powers due to his mom and dad forbid it. They always found out if he did. Maybe it was because of his built-up boredom from a combination of that ban on his powers, and the recent era of peace throughout Metroville. Either way, being able to inflict that same feeling of helplessness and humiliation on the tiny people made him happy. He was somewhat aware of his recent thoughts being those of a super-villain or other form of evil, but he reasoned that those people weren't part of their universe, so it shouldn't matter if they live or not right? What did he care? What did his family care? Besides, he was only keeping his little brother entertained...That's goodwill, surely!

Speaking of home, the two were soon about to reach it, since his brother started missing mommy and nearly cried about it. Figuring they have been gone for a bit and they could continue their fun tomorrow, (and also slightly scared of the baby's newly mentioned abilities), the older boy told the baby that they could go home for now and see mommy, making sure to also play with another world tomorrow provided that Jack-Jack agreed to not blow up their minds, even when he gets mad. Of course, Jack-Jack mostly understood and giggled innocently at the promise of more fun tomorrow with his brother. "Oh yeah, we also need to come up with an excuse as to why our suits got destroyed. Useless material..." Dash muttered underneath his breath. That wasn't gonna be fun to explain to their parents or Edna...Although, now that he thought of it. "I could just tell them a half-truth!" Dash grinned.

After arriving home and changing...

"Dash, Jack-Jack, we're home!"

Upon hearing his mother's voice, the eager ten-year old ran there in a millisecond with his little brother, who reached out towards his mommy that immediately picked him up into her arms and rocked him gently. "Aw, did Jack-Jack miss us?~" Jack-Jack giggled happily, as Bob looked around and whistled. "I'm impressed son! You managed to keep the house clean this time!" Dash smirked and stood proudly at the praise, before remembering the suits and laughing nervously, which made both of them raise an eyebrow at him, as Violet groaned. "What did you do this time?" "Hey, I didn't do it! Jack-Jack did!" Dash immediately got the torn clothing in question, as Helen and Bob gasped in alarm. "How did this happen honey!?" "Were you attacked while we gone!?" Putting his hands up in surrender, the freckled blond explained in a rush, "Whoa, calm down! It's nothing like that! I was out playing with Jack-Jack in the yard and he suddenly grew us both, destroying the suits! I got him to change us back before any damage was done or anyone noticed though!" All three older family members blinked and looked at one another, then at the youngest family member who giggled at the memories, before Bob sighed and picked up the phone. "I'll give Edna a call..."

After that was handled and Edna promised to give him new suits by tomorrow morning, (adding to make sure they can stretch and slim down at any height), the super family had dinner. Helen and Bob droned on in excitement about the crime wave and super-villain of the week they got to stop (which the kids tuned out except Jack-Jack, who was entranced by the tale), while Violet looked a bit more happier than usual, leading Dash to assume things were going well with her boyfriend, (making him feel happy for her, but nearly retch at the thought of his older sister getting all mushy with that Tony fellow). As he quickly ate up all the beans, Helen stopped her rambling in notice and shock. "Dash, you ate all of your beans willing today? I thought you hated them." Dash grinned innocently at her as he got up and turned to leave to his room. "What can I say, your cooking improved since last time~ Night Everyone!" As he left the next second, Helen pouted a bit and shouted up towards his room,"Hey, what's that supposed to mean!?" Bob chuckled and comforted his wife, "Don't worry Helen. I think your cooking is just fine!" Helen smiled gently and the two began to compliment one another before getting lost in their story-sharing again.

Meanwhile, Dash laid in his bed staring at the ceiling, lost in thought. "Man, today was so much fun! I got to make Jack-Jack happy, and toy with another world with him! Oh, I just can't wait for tomorrow! Maybe I'll let Jack-Jack eat the planet this time when we finish with them!" At the mention of it, the boy grinned and blissfully thought back about eating the earth they were on when Jack-Jack grew him so big, the earth looked like a gumball to him. So, he ate it like one and chewed, surprised at first that the magma core only tasted spicy instead of burning his taste buds off, (something he guessed was a side effect from the growth), He relished in hearing the world's inhabitants shriek near at once for him to listen once placing it in his mouth, the taste not being anything too special, but the power-trip making him moan blissfully in delight.

Patting his stomach at the memory, the smirking ten-year-old couldn't help but think to himself, "I wonder how bad my gas will be tomorrow from eating a planet, and from mom's cooking!~"

The next day...

Edna quickly stopped by and delivered the new suits, (taking a bit more time to act a bit like her new title 'Auntie Edna' to Jack-Jack, much to the baby's delight), before heading back in her car. After having breakfast, the phone ran again and the next city Winston Deavor wanted Mr. Incredible and Elastigirl to help was detailed to them, prompting them to leave once again, but not before Bob added to Dash, "And make sure to keep the suits intact this time!" "Okay dad!" After they left, Violet walked happily to the door with some nice clothes, as Dash asked curiously, "Where are you going?" "To hang out with Tony at the mall~" As she left, Dash rolled his eyes and snarked underneath his breath, "Yeah, cause that's a place boys love to go to..." Seeing as they had the rest of the day to themselves basically, Dash glanced towards his fellow masked brother, who glanced back curiously at him. "So Jack-Jack! Ready to have some more fun with those other worlds today?~" Giggling at the idea of squishing more tiny people underneath him or playing puppets with them, the baby nodded, as Dash cheeky grinned and nodded back, ready to travel with him...until his stomach rumbled in hunger, Jack-Jack's following suit a second later. "...Right after we have lunch." Jack-Jack garbled in agreement as Dash got some food Mom and Dad left them in the fridge.

After they finish, what happens next?
115222222222222222222221122112.title: Continue destroying the city either normally or...

1152222222222222222222211221122.content:
Dash and jack jack finished their lunch and got ready to go. “Ready to go screw with some more worlds jack jack?”, Dash asked. Jack jack let out a happy garble and began to concentrate. They disappeared in an instant. Seconds later they arrived at a new world. Dash got a good look from where they landed. This time it looked like a small village. “This should be fun”, Dash said. “Alright Jack Jack you know the drill make us big!”


Jack jack laughed and began to concentrate once more, the two boys started growing very quickly, soon in a matter of seconds they were 600 feet tall. Even though the super suit didn’t tear to shreds, the super suits still exposed the boys belly’s and legs. “Alright Jack Jack lets go show these wimps who’s boss. Dash picked up how brother and ran quickly to the village. The village people stood their in shock at the sight of the two boys. Dash smirked and said “Little slaves your world is ours!!” Dash picked up a few tinies and tried crushing them in his hands, it worked like a charm. His brother also tried it and was successful. Dash thought for a moment as the village people continued to scream. He decided to stomp on a few tinies by taking a walk in the city. Dash started to walk and he crushed people under his huge feet. Jack jack tried crawling which was surprisingly just as, if not more effective.

Suddenly, Dash walked through the city, he saw two huge figures, but they were far away so it was hard to see. Jack jack crawled over and let out a curios garble. “I wonder what that is”, Dash thought to himself. “Hey Jack Jack lets go check it out. Dash picked up his brother and sped over. Soon, he was able to make out the details of the figures. The figures were two boys, both who looked a little older than dash. They also looked very similar, besides their hair color. One had yellow hair and the other bad orange. Both of them looked around to be their size and destroying another part of the village. Dash got curious and picked his brother up and walked over.

The two figures noticed him and turned around, it was silent for a few seconds.

Dash quickly broke the silence with asking the two boys, “Who the heck are you two !”
1152222222222222222222211221122.title: New world means new fun!!!

choices: "toy with our new size a bit more, maybe more daring later~"
"start throwing our powers into the mix to cause some real destruction!~"
11522222222222222222222112211221.content:
A/N: Partly spoilers for Mother 3 by the way...

In another universe entirely, there was a lone boy.

A boy who used to be full of cheer and merriment.

A boy who his former friends and neighbors use to call shy.

A boy who was a shell of his former self due to the horrors he's seen on his journey, as he walked across the empty streets of the supposed utopia.

That boy's name, was Lucas.

After pulling the final needle, the dark dragon began to destroy everything and everyone, resetting the world. But whether would come back r not afterwards was all dependent on Lucas' heart. His friends believed he had enough hope left to make the world a beautiful place, where Porky's influence didn't affect their lives. A world free from money, chimeras, and other inconveniences introduced by King P, a more expansive world as well.

However, due to all of the sadness Lucas built up in his heart during his adventure, from his neighbors and friends being brainwashed, to losing his mother, and later his brainwashed brother who took his own life upon snapping out of it, that happy ending never came for anyone. The world was reset and every bit of land from Lucas' memory materialized, along with the entirety of Onett that Lucas saw from Porky's movie theater with his friends at one point only because he was slightly interested about that Ness person, (who he later met in person from the three smash tournaments he participated in with the kid), but no one came back with him. All of the humans that came into the new world were brand new. No one he was familiar with, and no one he met from said smash tournaments. He was completely alien to the new world.

He supposed he should count his blessings that life got to continue at all after the end of the world, but no matter how much or how far he searched, having no one from his past come back made him feel so lonely. Another thing that he guessed was a blessing of some sorts was having some of the dark dragon's power in him, allowing him to not only no longer require certain body functions to live, but also recreate people from his memories. That's how he got Kumatora and Boney included in his final smash during the most recent tournament, but they lacked the original personalities. And no matter how much the poor desperate kid tried, he couldn't reach out to their souls and truly bring back his friends. The expressions of those soulless copies wore a smile, but they looked empty. The whole situation reminded Lucas of his chimera brother, the very thought making his chest hurt.

After a while of this, Lucas grew numb to the pain he constantly carried inside of him, now frequently seen with a emotionless stare by any passerby.

Back in the present day, the boy slowly walked through the streets of New Pork City, traversing his way down to where the final needle use to rest and stared at the resting place with some degree of controlled anger. "So this is what you've made huh? A world distant to me, yet filled of painful reminders of my journey...Never would've pegged a creature like you to have a sick form of humor like this..." The chilling empty tone that left the boy's mouth would've made anyone nearby flinch in uneasiness. "To top it off, you gave me enough of your power to be unable to die...I'm not even sure if you exist anymore, but if you do, I promise to make you wish you killed me off with the rest of those I held dear." A surge of powerful psi slowly escaped the boy's body from his rage, but he took a deep breathe and let it diminish for now, lost in his thoughts about what he should do at this point. As if to answer, he turned around and saw a sight that made him flinch slightly, before sighing. "Funny, I thought I left my brother's copy at our old home..." As he turned around, the supposed copy said something that made the blond boy flinch once more in shock, "That's funny, I think I'm the real Claus, since I remember everything that happened up to this point~" Upon turning around and seeing that cheeky smile of his chimera brother's face, Lucas was overcome by both sadness and another emotion he hadn't felt in quite some time, joy. Tears left his eyes as he ran forward and embraced his brother with a hug, letting out all the grief and regret he kept bottled up over the last few months.

After recovering from his emotional outburst, Lucas once again put on his stoic expression, with his brother caught up about the aftermath of waking the Dark Dragon. "Wow...This sounds like a bleak world we entered. No one from our past is around anymore..." At the statement, Lucas clicked his tongue and glanced towards the familiar grey capsule with a look of great disdain. "Not everyone..." Seeing the Capsule in question, Claus sighed with just as much discomfort at the fact that Porky was still alive in there. "Of course his capsule protected him from the end of the world..." The red-haired kid harbored great hatred towards that short, fat, decayed husk of a man, but knew it was pointless to even try to beat his frustrations on the pig king with him locked in the capsule. So he settled for kicking the capsule away a few ridges before forgetting about his rage in favor of showing his brother something cool. "Hey, check this out little brother~" His wings suddenly folded into his back and his mechanical arm and eye shapeshifted into real ones instead of synthetic, giving him the appearance of what he use to look like before turning into a chimera, as he stood there with a proud grin. "Some of the Dark Dragon's power flowed into me as well, so now I can do cool stuff like this! Feels good having a normal eye and arm again! Though maybe I should keep the wings, I enjoyed flying around..."

Seeing his brother's stoic expression not budge, Claus got worried and gave his brother a gentle, comforting look. "You okay Lucas? You don't seem like your usual self." At this, the boy slightly smiled briefly, before sighing and looking at the caverns with a blank stare. "Claus...I feel happy for you, but after everything's transpired, I'm not the same person I was from 3 years ago, or even who I was when you died. I feel nothing but resentment about the whole thing; the Pigmask, Porky, and especially the Dark Dragon for put us in this kind of position..." After hearing about what his brother went though during his emotional outburst, Claus could tell why and pondered on how to lift his brother's spirits. Once he thought of one, he spoke his mind. "Well, then why not destroy this world?"

At the confused stare he got, the 'older' twin, (Lucas use to say it was only by a few seconds), explained with a calm expression, "You clearly don't value this world. Sure, everything looks the same, but there's nothing here that holds any meaning to you right?" The blond nodded, adding in coldly, "It's like some sick form of irony and it hurts to even look at it." Nodding with a mischievous grin, the red-haired 13-year-old asked in a coy tone, "So, wouldn't you like to destroy it to get back at that stupid dragon? I say we show him exactly how we feel about his world!" At that statement, the blond teen smirked and nodded back in agreement, psi sparking in his fingertips already. "Whoa, slow down a bit! I have a fun way we can start destroying stuff~"

Lucas didn't see what Claus meant by that, adding in, "So you're saying destroying everything with psychic abilities isn't fun?..." His twin laughed, making Lucas pout slightly. "Oh Lucas, where has your imagination gone? Sure, we could, but I was thinking along the lines of taping into the power we got from that stupid beast! Come on, I'll show you on the surface~" Without warning, Claus changed back to his chimera form and activated his jet wings, practically tackling his brother upon boosting forward and catching the startled boy on his back with ease, flying through the entryway above ground and leaving New Pork City behind, landing at Tazmily Village (still having the appearance of a modern town), onlookers staring at the two children with fascination, especially at Claus. After getting off of his brother, Lucas asked curiously, "Why'd you bring us here?" "Oh... just felt like it'd be better to do this outside where more pedestrians are located~" In the next second, Claus paused and focused with closed eyes, as a bright light enveloped his body and caused everyone to cover their eyes from the intense shine. When it dimmed and Lucas adjusted his sight, he gaped in amazement at the sight of his massive grinning brother, glancing down at the frightened locals by his now gigantic feet, his clothes also grown.

"Here's what I think of your technology by the way!" The giant teen raised his foot in one second and then stomped down on some nearby buildings the next, crushing a group of people underneath the shadow in that time-frame, as everyone else started to panic and flee while screaming in terror. Claus giggled from his actions, rather enjoying the feeling of destroying so many lives with just his size alone. He then glanced at his brother with a smirk, who was still in shock by what just happened. "Well bro? Do you wanna try it out?~" After a few more seconds, the shocked expression slowly shifted into a dark grin, as Lucas copied his brother and grew just as big as him a few seconds later, kicking a few buildings with his feet and watch with glee at the flying debris falling onto some of the fleeing people and squashing them into a vicious red paste on the streets. "Yeah, you're right, this is more fun! I say we..."
11522222222222222222222112211221.title: Temporary Sideline to a pair of Psychics.

choices: Use their powers for some destructive fun!
Torture the tinies in another stinky way....
115222222222222222222221122112211.content:
Lucas and claus nodded in agreement to toy with their brand new size! Lucas felt so happy and powerful now that he was back with his brother and was now at a huge size, being able to destroy a whole bunch of things. “So what should we do first?” Lucas asked his brother. Claus thought for a moment, but was disturbed by a pinch from his leg. Lucas felt the same.

Both boys looked down in annoyance and saw some military trying to stop their fun. Lucas and Claus looked at each other and laughed. The laughter from these big boys was shaking the ground. “Oh silly stupid bugs you’ll never stop our fun!” Lucas said as he lifted his giant foot and crushed them. “Good job bro, show those little pests whose boss.” Lucas and Claus both smiled and started to have some more fun by stomping through the city. Suddenly Lucas had an idea and called his brother over, “Let’s make these bugs worship our smelly feet”, Lucas said. “Mine will be really stinky considering i rarely change my socks”, Lucas said. “Great idea bro”, Claus said. Both boys removed their sneakers and sweaty socks. As soon as they exposed their feet, the tinies coughed and gagged. The smell from both boys feet smelled gross. It smelled of rotten eggs and sweaty teen boy body odor. While Lucas was a little quiet about this, Claus spoke in a demanding voice, “Little slaves you will now worship my feet and my brothers feet or else!” Both boys sat down, crushing some buildings in the process and Claus ordered them to rub. The tinies scared out of their mind listened and began to rub.

Soon both boys got tired of this and stood up and thought about what to do next...
115222222222222222222221122112211.title: "toy with our new size a bit more, maybe mo...

choices: "Let's do it now! You're going down!"
"Maybe later. I kinda want to enjoy just destroying stuff."
1152222222222222222222211221122112.content:
Lucas had to admit, the feeling of being so huge reminded him of how much power he now wielded. He had his Psi attacks, along with the ones the famous Ness showed him how to use in that tournament, he had no need for human body functions, (though he could still use them if he felt like it), he could make moving replicas of his deceased friends, and alter sizes of others or himself. On top of all of that, he didn't even tap into all of the power the Dark Dragon gave him and his brother. The prospect intrigued him and he wanted to try that out sometime later, one idea in particular coming to mind after they destroyed this world.

Watching with cold eyes and a smile to match at the fleeing tiny people by his feet, the blond teen used his Psi to pick up a building nearby and throw it down in front of the crowd, blocking their escape route. They shrieked and screamed as the boy's foot loomed over them for a second before they were carelessly crushed underneath his smelly bare foot, laughing from his newfound power-trip. Lucas never thought to try this out during the smash tournaments when he got a mushroom or rarely zapped even bigger by a lightening screw up. Then again, he didn't have the heart to try anything with it and he was fairly certain his shyness would've also interfered with such thoughts. (Didn't help that Master Hand and Crazy Hand were also watching over them in the background should any of the fighters do anything shifty or rule-breaking). This was first time Lucas enjoyed being huge and part of him wanted to go back in time at this size to show that stupid Porky Statue how it feels like being chased. His musings were interrupted by his brother, "Hey bro, come here! I just thought of something we should try!" Curious, the blond absentmindedly stomped through more of the village, destruction and cries of help following each step.

Lucas was greeted to the sight of his brother's chimera form, toying with his cannon's fire on a few buildings, those in range of the blast incinerated to ashes. Seeing his brother, the grinning teen changed form to his normal look. "So, don't you think it's about time we get a bit more creative with our toying?" Lucas immediately thought of his psi powers, but doubted Claus meant creative in that form. "What do you mean by creative then?..." With a cheeky grin, the elder twin sat down on a couple of nearby buildings, pedestrians fleeing for their lives as the massive butt and building debris fell down. Only a few were lucky enough to not end up crushed by either, but they were now pinned underneath the boy's clothed rump, struggling to get free."Oh, something like this..." Those trapped people thought it couldn't smell any worse, but they were proven wrong as the last thing they heard and felt was a booming thunder sound and a strong gale of hot, putrid air that killed them a few seconds after.

Lucas watched with a blush of embarrassment from what his giggling brother did, as the horrible smell infiltrated his nose and the blond immediately began coughing and waving the air away. "Agh!..." *cough* "Claus, t-that's not creative!" *Cough* "That's just gross! Oh god, i-it's smells like death!" Unashamed, the red-haired teen stuck out his tongue before standing up and glancing at his work with a smirk, before addressing his brother. "Well first off, I'm basically an undead zombie. What did you expect it to smell like? And it's more creative than just simply stomping on stuff." Looking unconvinced, the blond scoffed. "Creative is one way to put it..." "Aw come on Luke~ Just try it out! Maybe you'll enjoy it~" Lucas blushed and meekly looked away, the very thing of doing something so gross and mean making him feel shy about it, like his old self 3 years ago. Then his brother egged him on. "Heh, what's the matter? Too chicken?~" Feeling annoyed, Lucas defended himself with crossed arms. "I'm not, but there's no way I'm doing that, no matter what size I am!" Toothily grinning, Claus wrapped an arm around his brother and ruffled his hair. "Maybe you're just too shy to do it! Thought everything you've been through got rid of that shyness, but I guess you'll always be my scaredy cat little brother~" That got to Lucas and made him pout. "First, it was by all of 5 seconds and second, I'm not that timid boy anymore!" "Oh really? Then why don't you prove it?~" "Okay fine, I will!" Claus watched with a victorious smile as his fuming brother stomped away to a section they didn't touch yet. "I always was good at playing him~"

Absentmindedly fixing his hair while stomping through the industrialized town, Lucas thought to himself with a look of annoyance, "That insensitive jerk! Doesn't he know part of that hell was mourning his and our mother's death!? And I can bold!" Finding a couple of small apartment buildings clustered together and people fleeing nearby, the angry blond scooped them up and momentarily blushed at what he was about to do, before glancing at his cheeky brother and forgetting all about that shyness, surprising his brother by opening his waistband and depositing them backside while they screamed, snapping it shut once they were all in. Lucas shuddered a bit from the weird feeling. He had a bunch of people trapping against his colossal buttcheeks. It felt weird, but some part of him liked the experience, humiliating the tiny people in such a demeaning way.

Remembering what he was dared to do, the blond teen turned around and sat down on the buildings, slowly crushing them and the unfortunate people who were too slow in evacuating the area. Upon feeling his butt touched the ground, the blue-eyed teen felt that weird feeling again, as some survivors were now wriggling underneath his clothed cheeks, trying desperately to escape, much like with Claus a few minutes ago. Lucas felt a small smile form on his face from the dominance and then glanced at his brother. "You watching this Claus!?~" "Oh don't worry, I am!" Nodding to himself and much like his brother, the blond giant gave those poor squirming tinies no warning before they experienced the same hell of a thunder-like boom, a strong gale that sent those who were not trapped but in range flying, and a horrible odor caused most of those nearby to lose their lunch, while those in range died from lack of fresh air.

Lucas stood up a minute later, as his brother stomped over while laughing, shutting up and groaning as soon as he caught whiff of the stench. "Oh man, and you said mine was bad! Yours is like rotten eggs mixed with skunk!" Lucas blushed slightly, but said with a look of boldness, "Well, the food I did eat on my journey wasn't exactly what my stomach was use to. Anyway, told you I wasn't afraid to do it!~" Grinning, the red-haired teen nodded excitedly. "Yeah you did, and I didn't expect you to just pick up that nearby group and shove them inside your underwear like that. Those poor tiny bastards probably got the worse of it!~" Lucas couldn't help the blush on his face. That sentence just sounded embarrassing. "So, how did it feel?" Looking at his brother, Lucas answered with a smirk, "It felt embarrassing at first, but I enjoyed humiliating those tiny specks like that. Made me feel superior, you know?" Laughing, the elder twin nodded in agreement. "Told you that it was fun!" "Still not very creative though..." "Oh you spoil sport!" The two laughed with each other, missing these sort of brotherly moments.

After calming down, Claus thought of something and said with a sly smirk, "Well then, maybe we should hold a stink contest to see who's smell's worse? Doesn't just have to be with our butts either~ How's that for creative?~" Lucas shrugged. "Eh, kinda better, but for some reason, I can't help but think other duo thought of this before..." Claus looked at his brother with a skeptical look before the blond shrugged. "I dunno, maybe it has to do with my psychic abilities." "I guess...Anyway, should we do the contest now, or later?" Lucas thought about it decided...
1152222222222222222222211221122112.title: Overcoming Remnants of Shyness.

11522222222222222222222112211221122.content:
“Maybe later brother, i wanna just enjoy destroying stuff some more!” The blonde boy said with a tone of excitement and a smirk, starting to enjoy his power even more. The red haired boy smiled and said “Whatever you want Luke, any ideas on how we should do this.” “Lets use our powers for a bit!” Lucas said. Claus smiled and said “Great Idea!” He was already getting his powers ready.

The blonde boy sparked up his well known ok fire and began shooting, casing fires, death, and destruction in its path, the grin on the blonde boys face began to grow more dark, sadistic, and big, he was enjoying this so much, power was running through his veins.
Claus decided to spark ⚡️ up a huge thunderstorm ⛈! Death and destruction was caused everywhere by the psychic teens. Lucas’s pk fire spread very quickly like a forest fire 🔥! Claus’s thunder storms strangely didn’t put out Lucas’s fire. It was causing destruction like Lucas’s fire. Both of these attacks proved to be deadly as many tinies were killed by the power of the young boys!

As the boys were using their powers....
11522222222222222222222112211221122.title: More Death and Destruction!

115222222222222222222221122112211222.content:
While watching the fire, Lucas couldn't help but tease his brother with a smirk, "What's the matter? Not gonna use your sword to call down thunder? Just gonna mimic me?" Shooting his brother a glare, Claus quickly changed to his chimera form and drew his sword. "I wasn't going to, but if this doesn't bring up bad memories at all for you, why not?..." Upon raising his sword, a jolt of lightening shot up to the sky and the thunderstorms got worse in seconds, lightening bolts raining down on the town, destroying everything and everyone left, making Lucas go wide eyed for a second, before he chuckled. "Wow...Kinda forgot how strong you were as the commander." Sticking out his tongue, Claus sheathed the sword with a content look. "You mean are, I'm pretty sure I could kick your ass anytime of the day little brother. I did one shot your friends last time~" Muttering 'by a few seconds' under his breathe, the blond looked at him with a determined expression. "Maybe, but if you remember, you had a handicap in our last fight. I kicked your ass every other time we crossed paths." Taking that as a challenge, the elder twin got a competitive look. "Oh really? Fine then. Let's prove who's stronger with a mock fight. Winner gets to eat this planet~" Feeling just as competitive, the younger twin nodded. "You're on! I was done with this world anyhow!"

A few moments later, the two stood a yard (to them) away from each other, Lucas looking forward with a determined glare at his grinning chimera brother. "Alright, let's set a few restrictions. No using any powers the dark dragon gave us, our size stays this way for our fight! Since I'm not holding back as the commander, you can use those tricks you got from those smash tournaments, along with the Psi you learned from your time there." Hearing all that made Lucas smirk. "Heh, you sure you're not stocking the odds against you too much?~" Chuckling from the cheek his formally shy brother was currently gave him, Claus put on his helmet and gave a creepy grin, his red synthetic eye glowing to add to the creep factor that made Lucas shudder. "Oh, you'll need those tricks little bro~ Ready? Go!" Without warning, the elder twin lunged forward with his sword in hand, Lucas immediately dodging to the left out of instinct and backing up, not expecting the fight to begin so suddenly. That hesitation cost him a bit, as Claus mercilessly swung again at him, Lucas hissing a bit in pain when his sword stuck against his arm, using his Psi to nullify the damage greatly. Now knowing just how aggressive his brother was going to be in this fight, Lucas kicked him back a couple of countries, (feet to them), and shot his PK Fire at him.

Claus dodged a few but one nicked him and pushed him back a bit, the remaining shots setting a few country ablaze, which got worse once the elder twin used his jet boosters in his wings to try and tackle his brother. Having experience some many fighters lunging themselves at him before, the younger twin simply dodged to the side and just as Claus passed next to him, hit him hard with his stick, sending him flying towards Onett. Hitting the ground face-first, Claus groaned and shook the debris off him, glancing towards his brother's direction only to see a sphere of ice heading towards him. He couldn't get out of the way before getting hit by PK Freeze, his body encased in ice as Lucas then shot PK Thunder towards him from the distance, knocking him around a bit, while the town's people below fled as best as they could from all the chaos. Claus eventually broke out and when he did, he looked annoyed. "Let's see how he deals with this..."

Lucas carefully watched his brother, as said chimera took to the sky momentarily, before quickly pointing his cannon at Lucas and rapidly firing shots at him, the blond boy dodging as much as he could but getting hit a couple of times. Now equally annoyed, Lucas took out his stick once more and knocked one of the shots at the commander, making him flinch and seemingly short out, which took the chance to use Pk Thunder to knock himself into the paralyzed teen. As he came towards him though, the commander flashed a malicious grin and struck him with his sword, making Lucas gasp and cough up some blood, before blasting him in the back and sending the blond shooting towards New Pork City, crashing into the tower and killing hundreds of residents to the city. Lucas coughed and slowly got up as Claus grinned above him in the air. "Give up yet little bro?~" "I'll say this much, had you been alive, I think you could've been a fighter in one of those tournaments I participated in!" Laughing in agreement, Claus began to proudly boast about himself with closed eyes, which Lucas took as a chance to slowly get underneath him, the sound of destruction not even fazing Claus out of his boasting. When he did open them and noticed Lucas wasn't there, Claus looked down with widen eyes just before Lucas shouted, "Pk Love!", and sent a flurry of powerful hexagon-shaped Psi at him, sending Claus flying in the air. Lucas went after him, using his Psi to jump high and hit him with a few more Psi attacks before the chimera counterattacked and shot him with as much power in his cannon as he had, both exhausted by this point and falling down, crashing into another continent.

Slowly the two got up and panted, looking at each other and saying at the exact same time, "I give up!" The two shared a laugh as Lucas healed them both. Dusting the debris off their clothes, not even sparing another glance at the destroyed nations below, the blond asked with confusion, "So if we both won...who gets to eat the planet?" Shrugging, the chimera turned back to human form. "We could share it I guess." Lucas shrugged and nodded, before adding with a smirk, "Sounds good, but I get to eat the next world whole." Sticking out his tongue, the elder twin shot back, "In your dreams! Next time I will because next time, I won't get distracted by dirty tricks!" "You did that to yourself and because, you did it first with that fake out~" Huffing, Claus looked away in embarrassment, not having a good argument against that.

Soon, the two grew themselves bigger than the planet itself, the earth as big as an apple to them. Evidently, they had no need to breathe in space with the Dark Dragon's power, Lucas looking down at the puny planet before him with a cold grin, feeling so superior to all the little microbes screaming down below. Claus sliced it in two a moment later, the very action causing what felt like the start of the apocalypse on both sides, volcanic activity and storms rising as the ground shook, everyone screaming and hoping that this was all just some bad dream.

As Claus took his piece that held New Porky City and Tazmily Village, he realized two things that made him a bit unsure, which Lucas noticed. "What's up?" "Well it's just...On one hand, this side of earth is where we both farted on that embarrassment of what our town used to be like, but on the other hand, it also has New Pork City where that fat bastard is still locked away in that capsule...I want to make him at least spent an eternity in my stomach, but at the same time..." "...Yeah I get it...Well I'm definitely not trading so if you don't want it, don't eat it." Grimacing, Claus shook his head and said, "Fuck it. The smell probably went away by now anyway and that old fatty needs to pay!" Claus threw it in his mouth and chewed, the taste not the best, but not the worse he's had, the Earth's core not even fazing him due to his powers. Lucas did the same seemed to enjoy his a whole lot more than his brother, which Claus noticed with envy. "Why does it taste better for you than it does for me? I know that our gas wasn't the issue!" Swallowing with a content sigh, the blond teen turned to his brother with a smirk. "Simple, used the Dark Dragon's power to make it taste amazing!" 1152222222222222222222222222222111.content:
Dewey just got pounced by his brothers Malcom and Reese for the thousandth time. He was getting sick of it. “God, I’m so sick of being pushed on by my stupid brothers, I wish I could just get revenge on them and teach them a lesson”, Dewey complained! What made matters worse was that Hal and Lois were not in the house, they were having an anniversary vacation, leaving him with his brothers to beat him up. Dewey decided to get a snack to try and help him calm down and because his stomach was growling *gurgle growl grumble*,but he had to be careful because when you’re the youngest youngest in a family full of boys, getting any sort of food is a challenge, lucky for Dewey, both of his brothers ditched him, Reese went out to look for chicks and Malcolm went to Stevie’s. They told Dewey if he told his parents, they would beat him up. “Finally, I can get a snack without my stupid brothers pounding and beating me up for it”!, Dewey exclaimed.

He made his way to the fridge and opened it. Unfortunately, most of the food had either gone bad or was eaten and put back on the fridge by his stupid brothers. Dewey looked and soon found a plate of cookies and a can with a red label on it with words that said “DO NOT DRINK THIS”! There was no name so Dewey could not tell who’s it was. Dewey than saw another set of words hat said. This drink will put the drinker above the clouds.” Dewey ignored the label and took out the cookies and drink. He sat down on the couch and turned on the tv, so he could watch something while he ate his snack. Dewey opened the can and it let out a hissing noise. Dewey ignored it and decided to drink the liquid, while he ate the cookies. The drink really helped wash the cookies down, soon the dish of cookies was empty and so was the can of liquid. Dewey let out a very satisfied *BURP*! “That was good”, Dewey said. Dewey picked up the can and was about to crush it until he saw another word that was covered by dust, so Dewey blew of the dust and the word said Growth potion, cause some nonstop and irreversible growth. Dewey rubbed his eyes and punched himself to see if he was dreaming, nothing happens: “Oh my God, this is real, I drank a growth potion, I’m gonna grow nonstop”, Dewey shouted happily. Just then, Dewey felt strange, he began to inch upward. “It’s working, I hope I get bigger then Malcom and Reese”, Dewey said. Dewey’s clothes were not growing with him, his pants weren’t getting tighter and tighter and so was his shirt, soon Dewey was the same size as Reese. Dewey wasn’t upset though he knew the growth would happen again, it would just take time, the unstoppable part of the growth potion mean he would never stop growing and it did not have a limit on size. “Awesome, I’m bigger then Malcom and I’m as tall as Reese”, Dewey said. Dewey was left in only a pair of underwear, his pants and shirt had given up quickly. “It feels so good just being in my underwear”, Dewey said. “Now I can get revenge on my brothers”, Dewey said with a revengeful voice. Dewey got up and stormed into his room which he shared with all of his brothers.

“Now, what to do first to get revenge on my terrible brothers”. “I know I’ll destroy their stuff”, Dewey exclaimed. Since Dewey was bigger, destroying his brothers stuff was easy and fun too. This even turned him on a bit. Dewey destroyed things from Resses action figures to Malcom’s school work! Then Dewey heard a knock on the door, his brothers were home. “Perfect, now I can get revenge on them personally”. But first Dewey decided to let out a smelly fart to stink up the room form the bean burrito he ate earlier. He decided to hide from his brothers in the closet and spook them once he head the door open and his brother insulting him and turning on the tv on the living room. He went into his closet and waited for his brothers

11522222222222222222222222222221121.content:
Dewey was in his bed, which he shared with his brothers, sulking. He was recently pounded and beat up by his brothers. He wanted to fight back, but he really couldn’t. He was way shorter then Malcolm and Reese. While he was able to outsmart Reese really easily, since his brain was basically the size of a peanut and even able to outsmart Malcolm, who was a genius, a few times, he was never able to beat them in terms of size. “I always get the short end of the stick and my dumb ass brothers get more then I do, I’m stuck with their hand me downs!” “I wish I could just get back at them somehow!”, Dewey raged.

“Hey squirt get over here!”, Malcolm shouted. “Make me moron!”, Dewey retailed. “Get over here or you’re ass is getting pounded again!”, Malcolm shouted. Dewey sighed and reluctantly got up and went to see what his brother wanted. “What do you want?!”, Dewey asked angrily. “I want to test my new experiment on you”, Malcolm replied. He shows Dewey a strange looking ray device. He told Dewey it was an intelligence ray to make people smarter, when really it was a growth ray, which was supposed to be used on plants, but Malcolm wanted to see its effects on humans, he didn’t even consider the consequences, but in his family, consequences were rarely considered.


“Why the hell would I do this for free?! Give me money or no deal!” Dewey said angrily. “Fine I’ll give you ten bucks!”,said Malcolm. Malcolm gave the money to Dewey. “Alright Deal, test away!” Dewey said. Malcolm fired up the device and began to make a shifting noise. What Malcolm didn’t know was that the setting on the growth machine, was the highest setting, which meant whoever was shot would grow nonstop. He thought he put it on the lowest setting. The day then shot out a blue ray right into Dewey. Strangely, Dewey didn’t feel anything. The outline of Dewey’s body glowed blue for a second but it went away. The strong force from the machine after the blast forced the dial back down to the lowest setting, but Dewey was still shot with full power! “Well how do you feel?” Malcolm asked. “I don’t feel any different, you’re experiment sucks Malcolm.”, Dewey said. “Oh shut up squirt!” Malcolm said. Malcolm got rid of machine before his crazy bitch of a mom and his idiotic bother got home.

That night Dewey went to bed earlier then usual, but not before being mocked by his brothers. Dewey just scoffed, since he really didn’t give a shit anyway. As he went to bed he felt a warm feeling in his body, but he shook it off and went to sleep. Soon everyone in the house was fast asleep. Malcolm thought his machine was a failure, boy was he wrong! The only reason it didn’t work right away was that it would take a while to start. So Dewey’s growth spurts could go from slow to super fast and stay that way after a while.

The next day....
