125211.content: Should there be multiple giants or just Bridget, and Roger of course?
125211.title: Company or a crowd?

1252111.content: Tired of questions yet? Do you prefer 2nd person (You) or 3rd person (Bridget) perspective?
1252111.title: Perspective

12521111.content:
You are Max Krozer. A young stray with no home and no family. Youre no one important, at least you dont think so. Besides your name, you have no memory of your past... the last thing you remember was a girl in red smacking you upside the head with a guitar just cuz you wouldnt get out of her way fast enough!

Trying to shake off the pain in your head, you decide to take a nice long wide inside a secluded forest. Be one with nature... her calming embrace...

"WHHHAA!!!" you tripped on a big-ass yo-yo! Suddenly another yo-yo appears out of nowhere and entangles your legs together with its string!!! The other yo-yo entangles your arms together! You cant move!! What the hell just happened?!

"FOUND YOU AT LAST, MR. KROZER!!!"

That heavenly voice... you turn your head and see who it belonged to... a lovely young woman with long blonde hair, sky blue eyes, wearing a blue and white church outfit... like a young nun.

She approaches you as you try to put your dropped jaw back in its place. She stares at you in silence for a moment.. until she finally speaks, "Max Krozer.. you have been apprehended by the great bounty hunter, Bridget! Give yourself up nice and peacefully and there will be no bloodshed!"

You try to reason with her, "Um... ma'am, I believe youre mistaken... I am no criminal-" She interrupts you with a manlier tone of voice, " 'MA'AM'?! IM A GUY, YOU IDIOT!!"
"..WHAAATT???!!!" you scream in shock! Oh god... you almost puked after hearing that!! Bridget's a dude?! You had feelings for a dude?! You could NOT believe that!!

Nevertheless, you tried to reason with her uh.. HIM! "Uh... Bridget.. Im not a criminal! I didnt do anything wrong-"

"Likely story!" he interrupts! "You are wanted for the murder of a government official! According to the bounty list, youre worth just as much dead as alive! But... since Im such a nice guy, you can come with me nice and easy, and I promise you wont be harmed!"

...What should you do?
12521111.title: Dude looks like a lady!

125211112.content:
The combination of finding out he's a guy, and more importantly, that he's telling you you're wanted for murder, are just too much. You begin struggling against the taut Yoyo strings...they can't keep you down, nothing can, you will be free!! Yaaaargh!!!

After several moments of you blindly squirming in the Yoyos, Bridget becomes impatient. "Geez, well suit yourself. I can't be moving you around in this condition though..." you watch as he takes out a weird vial, poison?! You desperately continue with the futile squirming, making sure to clamp your mouth shut, no way he's going to make you swallow anything! Bridget calmly uncorks it and splashes the contents over your face. To your horror, you can feel it seeping into your skin, is this it? You turn to look up at Bridget, whose squatting down and smiling calmly.

"What did you do to me? I-" he cuts you short by putting a finger to his mouth and thouroughly shushing you. You'd like to protest further but a tingling sensation moves through your body, and then a weird feeling, as if a weight you always had is suddenly seeping out, leaving you lighter and lighter. But...those big green eyes above you are getting bigger and bigger! Holy crap! You're shrinking! It's a little hard to get your mind around, but with everything crazy that's been going on it's not as unbelievable as it would be another day. Bridgets massive smile is cut off as his huge hand eclipses you, and in a moment you feel the surprisingly soft skin of his fingers scooping you off the ground and forcing you into the fabric of his glove.

"Shouldn't have tried anything little guy, I'll give you something think about while we go." you struggle to lift your neck up, and past his fingers you can see him give a quick wink, geez, is there ANYTHING discerning this guy from a girl? Well, anything besides the obvious...your question will have to wait however, as you feel the fingers stretching outwards, you still completely trapped between them of course, and your back pressed firmly up against a hard, plastic surface. Bridget hums to himself as he straps you to the thing with a thin string, that embarrassingly enough seems completely capable of holding you down. He stands up a moment later, fully towering above you now. "Alright, let's go!" His arm moves gracefully, and you suddenly find yourself shot like a bullet away from him, WHUH?! Half a second later, your spun around wildly, ohgodohgodohgod! Then shot back next to Bridget's hand, only to be immedietely propelled away again, gaaaaah! Then it hits you, your on one of his stupid Yo-Yos! Damn!

You aren't sure just how long the trip to the police station is, your brain mercifully conked out on you for part of the trip. But soon you feel those deceptively soft hands grip onto you, and the Yo-Yo action cease.

"What do you need kid?" well, this is it, you're about to be taken God-knows-where for a crime you didn't commit!

"I've got Krozer, wanted for the murder of a government official!" Bridget beams, you're jostled slightly by his heels hopping up and down excitedly.

"Erm, let's see here...no, no-one by that name is currently wanted, and no officials have been murdered recently." ...SAVED, you're free! The system DOES work sometimes! God's light filters around you!

"R-really? Can you check again?!" After a few moments of confirming things with the attendent, Bridget sadly heads out of the station. Fearing another Yo-Yo session, you quickly speak up.

"So I get to go now right?" Bridget sighs and tears you from the Yo-Yo with a simple motion from his hand.

"Sorry little guy, I don't think there's a cure." ...SCREWED! What does fate have against you?! Darkness...darkness everywhere...

"Whaaaat?! I'm stuck like this forever?? What the hell man?!"

"Listen, just...nnngh, man my muscles are sore from today, I wish I could get more manly." How can he so casually change the subject?! Outrage! But, there's not much you can do about it at this juncture...he was able to beat you when you were oh, 30 times bigger then you are now! Suddenly, his eyes light up with a sparkle. "Oh I know! Hey, you can help me out!"
125211112.title: Huh what who why?!

1252111122.content:
If you were drinking a glass of water, you would DEFFINITELY do a spit-take to what he just said! Bridget's not actually thinking about cannibalism, is he??!!!
Nevertheless, you pretend you didnt hear that part and just ask, "Uh.. Im sorry. What did you just say again?"

That's when Bridget just snaps out of it as his little curious smile changes into a look of shock! "OH! Uh.. um... eh, it's nothing! Dont worry!" he gives you a cute innocent little girl smile that just makes you sick!
You breathe a sigh of relief... maybe you were just hearing things! I mean, sure the guy's pretty scrawny and would do with some protein in his system, but geez! Eating YOU?!! That's barabaric!

Speaking of barBEARic, as Bridget starts walking home with little you in his grip, he pulls out a cute little teddy-bear and starts talking to it! 'God, this guy sure is cute!' you think to yourself. However, you quickly change your mind when you listen in to what he's saying to the bear...

"Aww, what should I do, Roger? I bet this little guy's got plenty of nutrients and stuff to make me big and powerful.. not just some shrimpy bad-luck charm!"
He then puts his ear close to the teddy-bear's mouth as if to listen to what he's saying.

"...You think I should go for it? But... he's a human being! That's like cannibalism! ...uh huh... no, I dont think little Krozer's innocent either, but... yeah I guess youre right. Thanks, Roger! You sure are a pal!"

"Uh.. what did 'Roger' just tell you?!" you start getting suspicious.
"Eh, it's just non-shrunken guy talk. You wouldnt understand!" and again he changes the subject, "Gee, I sure am hungry! Are you hungry Max?"

"Uh, no thanks! Im just fine," you tell him.

Finally after a while of walking, Bridget takes you to a little shack that seems to be his home. The first thing he does is go into the kitchen and pulls out a big jug of 'Whey Protein' from a cubbord...

Bridget stares at the picture of a big built muscle-guy on the cover and says to himself, "Someday..."

He scoops some powder into a glass of milk and is about to chug it down... but before it even touches his mouth, he looks down at you with a raised eyebrow! You know for a fact, that aint a good expression!!!

"YAAAAWWWWWNNN!!" Bridget lets out a loud yawn and stretches his arms with his hands closing in on eachother. Or more specifically, the hand with you over the hand with the glass of protein-shake in it!!!

Just when you think it couldnt be worse, he opens the hand with you in it and 'ACCIDENTLY' drops you in the glass!!

"...Oops!" Bridget says with a cute little smile before lifting that glass up and over his open mouth!
1252111122.title: Gain muscle by ANY means necessary!

choices: That one eyed pink haired samurai! (Baiken!)
That woman in red with a guitar! (I-NO!)
12521111222.content:
You'd swim for dear life... if only you could swim! Maybe you forgotten how to after getting that bump on your head a while back. Too bad..
Not that it would help much, anyway! The gravity between the glass and Bridget's awaiting mouth was far too great!

"YAH-OOF!" as the rest of the protein shake went down that eerie darkness in the back on the throat you landed on that big, wet, slimy tongue and grabbed onto it for dear life! But it constantly shook around harshly trying to shake you off as if to say, "PST!! I dont think so, shrimp!"

*Slap!* "OW!" the very tip of the tongue smacked you upside the face, causing you to lose your grip... and slide near that very darkness just behind the soft reddish cavern with a uvula dangling above as to wave goodbye!

*GULP!*

And down you went! Squeezed down the esophagus as individual muscle along the walls pulsate and push you downwards to your last destination! So this was your fate. The very end of Max Krozer... your past will forever be a mystery... and youre not gonna have much of a future, either!

"aaaAAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHH!!!!!"
*SPLASH!* The ride ended with a huge splash of that milk you landed in. You lifted your head out and got a good look at your new home... A big rounded pinkish chamber about the size of your bedroom (you THINK). The walls are warm and feel like rubber. Not to mention, the groaning and churning sounds echo throughout the room and strange thick vapors emit into the room.

Welcome... to Bridget's belly. Your final resting place and the very first step to making the girly-man all pumped up and mooscular wit nutrients.. YOUR nutrients!

"Urp!" you could overhear him let out a dainty burp like a woman! What? He can even BELCH like a man, either?! "Mmm! That little convict sure hit the spot!" he smiled as he patted his belly in satisfaction, "I can feel my muscles growing stronger, already!"

Question: Does hearing that punk comment about you like that flatter you or just piss you off? ...What's that? It pisses you off?
"YOU SICK FREAK!!!" you scream out as you beat on the walls, "I CANT BELIEVE YOU JUST DID THIS TO ME!!!"

"Oh? Hey Roger, I think I hear him in there!" he tells his teddy-bear as he looks down at his stomach, "Hey Max! How's it feel being a part of the sneakiest bounty hunter out there?"
"LET ME OUT!!" you shout to him, "LET... ME... OUTTA HERE!"

"Sorry, little guy!" Bridget told you kindly smugly, "It's like Roger told me. Survival of the fittest. The big fish eats the little fish!" What a bastard!
"But this is CANNIBALISM!" you cry out, "It's barbaric! Inhumane! How could a human being do this to another human being?!"
He immediately snapped back at ya, "I bet that's what that one government official said before you murdered him in cold blood, huh?!" That was enough to shut you up. Is it true? Are you really a murderer? Sure, that cop said you werent a wanted man... but then again, you cant remember your past very well..

"I...I... but I couldnt... I could never...."
"Aw save it, Mr. Krozer!" Bridget stopped you in your tracks, "You should be lucky youre getting off so easy. I read somewhere it takes several hours before digestion starts, so that'll be plenty of time to think about what you done before your 'execution'!"
But that's the thing! What did you do?

"Huh? Who is that?" just then, you overheard Bridget's question, "that girl looks kinda suspicious..." you assume he's looking out a window or something.
"You think we should check it out, Roger? .....Hmm? ...Uh huh... ok, let's go!" Wonderful... he's gonna go after another innocent bystander. Maybe sometime after he figures out he screwed up again, you wont be alone in this horrible chamber before the acid kicks in!

"Um.... exuuuuuseee me, ma'am," Bridget exclaimed in that high-pitched girly voice that fooled you the first time around but now just sickens you, "Can I ask you something?"

"Go away kid, Im a little busy here." You overheard the woman's voice reply to Bridget in an uncaring tone... the voice did sound a little familiar, though.
"What's that you got there, ma'am?" Bridget asked her, continuing his deception, "That looks nice! Can I play with it? PLEEEEAASSEE?"

"KEEP YOUR HANDS OFF IT!" the woman shouted back at him, "It's not a toy! Dont you dare lay a finger on it!"
...Now you're starting to remember to her! You can start to make out a memory of someone... someone with that same voice...

12522222221221.content:
"Wake up, Sora!" Riku shook his spiky brown haired friend slightly. The two keybladers had been travelling via gummi ship for over five days, thanks to a wrong turn by Sora...they'd found themselves hopelessly lost within the void of space on the third day. After this happened, Riku took over the piloting duties and kept a lookout for any signs of worlds they could land on.

Needless to say their food had started to run out and both boys stomachs were growling. The inside of the gummi ship currently stank of boy musk being emitted from both males having been cooped up in here for days on end. Sora finally started to wake up and gave a big yawn and stretched his stiff limbs.

"What's the deal, Riku?" Sora asked, bright blue eyes looking over at his friend curiously. "We're approaching a world...FINALLY." Riku sighed and relaxed back in the pilot seat.

"Really?! Is it one we've been to before?! Like Agrabah?" Sora inquired and pressed his face up against the cockpit window like a child. "Nah, it says it's...Lilliput." Riku read the name of the world on the cockpit computer.

"What a weird name!" Sora frowned, "I hope they've got food there!" Sora and Riku's stomachs growled in unison, causing the silver haired Riku to blush slightly.

"Buckle up...we're coming in for landing." Riku said as he placed the ship on auto pilot.

The colorful gummi ship descended into the strangely named world's atmosphere. Sora looked out the window and yelped: "Gaaah!" comically flopping over from his seat.

"What's the matter?!" Riku yelled, Sora's sudden yell had startled him.

"Riku....it's..us!" Sora pointed out the window at a golden statue...two of them in fact who were currently staring lifelessly into the ship from their pedestals.

"What the....okay that's weird." Riku said as he recognized himself and Sora's faces immortalized in solid gold. Not only were these statues enormous, but they appeared to be flanking an expansive city which stretched on for miles. The statues' mouths were pouring out a constant flow of water which flowed through the middle of the apparently ancient city.

The vessel's landing gear came down as the ship was guided down to a suitable landing pad. "Finally! We can get outta here!" Sora cheered as the doors opened.

Riku and Sora groaned as they stretched their stiff limbs out in the hot midday sun of this city. The place was ancient and seemingly deserted, in comparison to the golden statues towering high above which looked to have been kept in pristine condition.

"Whoaaah! Is that a palace?" Sora said as he pointed to a huge marble structure overlooking the city. As Riku and Sora walked through the streets, it was eerily quiet.

"Maaan...I was hoping there'd be food!" Sora pouted and crossed his arms. Riku crossed his own sleeveless arms across his chest as they walked.

Dwellings they passed appeared to be kept up at least, and Riku swore he saw a tiny figure hurry out of sight when he looked through a window.

"Rikuuuu!" Sora's voice called from up ahead. Thinking his friend was in trouble, he rushed to where Sora was...only to find Sora staring at a large temple that was the only way to reach the palace.

It wasn't the temple itself that Sora was staring at in awe however....but ancient hieroglyphs which adorned the outside and inside walls.

"Okay this is getting creepy..." Riku muttered as he recognized himself and Sora on the walls. Entering through the arched entrance, Riku saw that candles were burning...meaning someone HAD to be here.

A large hieroglyph depiction of Riku was shown on the left side of the room, one of Sora on the right side. The drawings depicted Riku and Sora sitting atop thrones and being prayed to and served by miniature people.

"Riku...are those tiny people...worshiping us?" Sora asked, eyes wide with wonder.
12522222221221.title: Sora and Riku and The Mysterious World!

choices: "Go with the whole god worship thing."
125222222212211.content:
These set of murals were interesting to the two boys as they further inspect them, walking down along the hall before the lights turned up suddenly, blinding them temporarily as they raised their arms in reflex, it was soon that they gotten use to the brightness as they saw what appeared to be...

"Tiny men?" Sora asked rhetorically as they were then surrounded a bit by every corner, though they probably dont reach for more than an inch or two their size, making the two Keyblade wielders like giants to these inhabitants.

"Actually we prefer the term Antmen, its rather funny based on that movie we watched and decided to designate our race as that, has a nice ring to it wouldnt you agree?" A british voice amongst the many there spoke out as one of them stepped forward to Sora's massive shoe to look at the boy.

Sora smiled lightly at that and replied with, "Yeah its a bjt more accurate if you ask me." He told him as Riku rolled his eyes, "Right and while we are here complimenting someone the size of my finger, can you please tell us whats with the murals?" He asked the gentleman albeit impatiently glaring down at the man.

"Ah yes, you see, we were hoping to crown the wielders of light, the keyblade as our gods for this land space in time, we've heard many of your tales od adventure and we all shared the wonder of what would it be like to serve someone such as they!" He informed them as they lookes at eachother, not quite sure as to what to make of this.

"You know it kinda feels like we have a fan base here." Sora muttered to Riku as he nodded slightly and replied, "You're telling me, what do you think we should do?"
125222222212211.title: The tiny people make their appearance to welcom...

choices: Riku and Sora converse to their tinies while they are fed fruit on the journey
Sora and Riku are soon at the palace...
1252222222122111.content:
"Go with the whole god worship thing, duh. It sounds cool!" Sora said quietly back, his face lit up like a happy child. Riku chuckled and shook his head slightly at his friend's carefree attitude. But he had to admit being looked at as a god by such tiny people sounded...appealing.

"Alright, uh...Ant-Men, we're gonna give you the honor of serving us!" Riku declared with a smug grin. Cheers erupted from the crowd of Ant-Men.

The british voiced one nodded, "I am high priest Monou, I sort of run the ins and outs of the place when our gods aren't here or don't want to be trifled by lesser matters."

Sora had a wide grin on his face, "This is so cool! We're like giant gods, Riku!"

Riku smirked and nodded before turning his attention back to the tinies and making a proclamation. "Your gods have had a long journey! We're pretty hungry! And as I'm sure you can tell...." Riku lifted his arm and pointed to the visibly damp armpit of his. "We haven't bathed in some time!" Riku felt himself grow hard at his new authority.

"Yeah! My socks ain't been changed either! We might give you little fellas the honor of feeding us! And maybe if you behave you can bathe us!" Sora giggled playfully.

"But that's only if we feel like it......maybe we don't feel like bathing everyday." Riku chuckled mischievously.

Even if tiny people were grossed out by the stink wafting down at them from Riku's pit, they were more disciplined than to show it.

They had been taught and prepared for this moment for a long time!

Monou clapped his hands and two litters that dwarfed the tiny people, were carried in by none other than the tiny people.

The litters were covered to keep their gods in the shade while they were taken to the palace. "We will escort you to the palace! There you have a feast awaiting you! Food was prepared the moment your ship was sighted!"

"Woww...you guys are strong!" Sora said in awe.

"Yeah, even though you're small....that's pretty neat." Riku praised them with a chuckle.

Both titanic boys climbed into their respective litters once the doors on the sides were opened. Inside they would find an ant-man who was ready to feed them grapes and fruit during the escort.

Riku and Sora sat down and four ant-men lifted the litters and began to take them to the palace.

"Would you like some grapes, your majesty?" The tiny man asked Riku.

In Sora's litter, the tiny man was already feeding Sora orange slices.
1252222222122111.title: "Go with the whole god worship thing."

choices: They made it to the palace.
12522222221221111.content:
They made their way to the palace carried by the Ant-men, the two boys were impressed by the physical strength of these people. "You guys are pretty strong, how is this possible?" Sora inquired to one of the Ant-man on the arm of the chair who nodded in understanding and answered him, "Well thats a bit complicated but I'll explain, our bodies are denser than a normal human but with that density comes increased bone and muscle strength, now its not like we have broad bodies or anything, hindsight we probably break physics." He then shrugged and continued, "Bottom line, we're ridiculously durable." He told them.

"Oh, well anything about your civilization?" Sora wondered curiously to the man to which he ethusiastically nodded, "Of course, our society is a modern one, what with skyscrapers and cars and weapons, though we need extra strong stuff since our criminals tend to break out every now and again, maybe with your help we can do that." He said hopefully.

Riku nodded, "I just didn't think that you'd guys were specifically looking for us, why not someone stronger to better protect your city?" He questioned him.

"Oh we did, before you guys, we tried for different people willing to atleast protect us, turns out the multiverse had a lot of assholes that rather just destroy our city." The man said throwing up his hands in annoyance.

"Yeah wasn't there that Kevin kid? The prick smashed my house!" One of the other Ant-men remembered with irritation.

"Also that Tai brat too, well at the very least we dont have to deal with them." Another said in relief.

"How'd you get did of them?" Riku asked them.

"We teleported them back to their world, a lot of charge time and bodies to throw before it was finished to fire." The leader said to them.
12522222221221111.title: Riku and Sora converse to their tinies while th...

choices: Sora and Riku pig out and talk some more!
125222222212211112.content:
The enormous palace soon came into view, Riku and Sora's mouths dropped. It was an enormous place that sparkled like it had just been built.
"Whoaaa...." Both boys said with wide eyes as the front entrance was opened to reveal a luxurious and beautifully immaculate decorated throne room.

Riku and Sora's thrones were front and center, the first letters of their names carved into the top, 'R' and 'S'. The thrones looked extremely comfortable and were cushioned with lovely velvet lining. The litters were set down on the marble floor and Riku and Sora stood up and looked around. "This is.....this is all ours?" Sora asked, his face filled with childlike wonder.

"Yes! Of course!" The Ant-Men who had been carrying them proclaimed. Riku grinned widely, "This was worth that long trip in the ship, right Sora?" Riku turned to see Sora was gone!

"Huh?" Riku blinked in confusion before he lay eyes on the long table to the side of the throne room, covered in plates of delicious meat and side dishes and desserts.

Currently Sora was stuffing his face anime-boy fashion, like a ravenous beast with no concept of table manners. Riku licked his lips as he smelled the food, racing over to join his friend in pigging out.

"We hope you enjoy your feast, Gods!" The tinies said as they left, a few staying behind to attend to pouring drinks and bringing out more food.

Sora and Riku belched loudly in response.
125222222212211112.title: Riku and Sora's Palace!

choices: They discuss about the rival cities.
Finish their food and take a look around.
1252222222122111121.content:
They dug into the food that they were slightly starved off of for days of staying in the Gummi Ship, the two didnt necessarily question how these people have animal life that were bigger than them but they werent ones to question such a thing.

It was basic stuff like bread, rice and chicken with the occasional soda that the Ant-men had scrounge up in preparation for this feast.

"Man this stuff is great!" Sora complimented the people standing on the table as he bit through a wing of a chicken and took care to not inhale it too much.

"Thank you it was of no problem to have actually make it." Monsou said grateful to just have found them and took them in to help protect their civilization from rivals that seeked to destroy them and annex their area.

"So Monsou, what exactly you need us for? Its more than just idol worship from how you prepared all of this for is." Riku pondered about the actual reason they were brought to this place.

The man look a bit nervous at what he was going to tell them, "Well to be frank, we needed you to help protect us from other rival civilizations in this world, some we managed to get allies with, many others wanted to conquer us, and our Intel has it that they might have brought in gods of their own as our convoys have yet to return." He informed him.

Riku chewed a bit on his rice in contemplation of what was just explained as Sora tilted his head curiously though he can't help but want to help the little guys out.

"So what can we do to help? We're practically your gods so its the least we can do to help those under our protection." He declared with a reassuring smile that made Monsou hopeful.
1252222222122111121.title: Sora and Riku pig out and talk some more!

choices: Riku and Sora are into it
12522222221221111211.content:
Riku nodded in agreement, “We’re happy to help, we won’t let the rival tribes or whatever hurt you.”

Monsou and the other tinies were so overwhelmed by these two giants’ kindness that they began to cry happy tears.

Sora grinned widely before taking another huge bite of food. Riku looked up at the images of them on the walls, his gaze focusing on one in particular.

“Hey, what’s that one mean?” Riku pointed at the painting that seemed to showed Riku and Sora getting bigger and defending this city...while defeating the evil ones who sought to harm them.

“It is said that there is an ancient magic that is usable only by the Keyblades chosen ones. It is said to be able to grant both of you control over size...and many of the younger children in our village believe you will save us from the wicked enemies by growing into towering giants compared to even the largest of this world’s cities.” Monsou explained.

Riku and Sora had to admit...the idea of being able to grow genuinely humongous and going kaiju on the bad guys here DID sound appealing.

“So wait...we can actually get bigger than anyone? Not just you guys?” Sora asked curiously.

Monsou nodded, “There is a locked chest kept in secret that is said to hold magic that no one else is able to get at. The keyblades can unlock any lock in the universe...so it can only be claimed by you...our gods.” Monsou said as the other tinies bowed humbly to Riku and Sora.

“Sounds like that’ll give us an edge in...negotiations with the bad guys who are messing with you.” Riku smirked devilishly.

“Yeah! I bet you little fellas are excited to see us grow super-huge, huh?” Sora asked the tinies giddily.

“No matter how big we get though, we’ll still protect you.” Riku nodded with a kind smile at Monsou and them.

Soon Riku and Sora sat back, patting their full bellies and belching proudly. “Whew! I’m stuffed!” Sora declared.

“Me-UURP-too…” Riku blushed at the accidental belch he released.

“It’s time for you two to take your seats in your thrones...and be worshipped!” Monsou declared as the tinies cheered.

“Huh? Whaddya mean?” Sora blinked, oblivious.

“We remove your shoes and socks, rub and pamper your godly feet. Worship and kiss Riku’s divine armpits...et cetera.” Monsou explained casually.
12522222221221111211.title: They discuss about the rival cities.

choices: They then popped off the shoes.
125222222212211112111.content:
"Well since you're offering to do that sort of thing, I don't see no reason why not." Riku considered with a shrug, a light smile on his face at the idea of getting worshiped by these guys.

"So lets be on our way then." Sora agreed with his friend and gotten up from the chair as did Riku. They then walked down the intricate hallways of the palace with a still a sense of awe over the place. The Architect was something of a true Cathedral as intricate statues of many seemingly famous people (And themselves by extension) was staggering, to them it was like walking through a spacious hall of a museum, Sora couldn't help but think what it must be to them.

When they reached to the throne room, there it was sitting in the back of the room, two high-quality chairs with their first initials engraved at the top S and R respectively in gold.

Riku sweatdropped a little at how over the top it seems, "Well it certainly looks a bit gaudy." He mused looking at it as they walked closer to get a better look at it, "Could be worse right? At least its not dipped in gold and diamond encrusted." Sora said chuckling embarrassed at the idea.

"Oh you kidding me? Of course not, we're decent people not a overblown religious cult." Monsou joked with them as they took their seats on their chairs, sighing at the cushions on the seats.

"So how's this gonna work exactly? Kinda small to be pulling off laces and shoes." Sora mentioned to them not wanting to see them get hurt.

"Don't worry, we're Ant-men, we can figure this out!" He reassured him and with a snap of his fingers, a group of them went forward to latch onto different parts of Sora's shoes, not breathing in too deeply from the preview of the smell. They then got into position and then started to push and pull at his shoes in unison, to which he watched with amazement.
125222222212211112111.title: Riku and Sora are into it

choices: Riku unleashes his armpits as Sora finally gets his socks off
Riku waits for Sora to get his socks off..letting his b.o. stew a bit more
1252222222122111121111.content:
With a moist pop and a long relaxed sigh from Sora, the black footwear popped off of his socked feet. The tinies could tell by mere sight alone that these had been on the young spikey haired boy's feet for a long period of time. They were adhered to his feet almost like a second skin, and they were greyed and soaked in sweat. Not to mention the various holes littering these ratty socks that gave a preview of the teen's cute, pudgy soles.

The tinies cringed a bit at the overwhelming cheesy aroma that billowed off from Sora's big feet. Sora chuckled sheepishly and blushed a bit, "Hehe...sorry about the stink!" He said, though to be honest this was quite funny to him...forcing his foot odor onto a bunch of tiny folks.

Riku shook his head and wrinkled his nose at the sharp cheddar aroma coming from the newly unleashed feet. "Jeez, Sora...those bad boys are rank!" Riku teased. Sora grinned widely, "Just wait til' these socks come off! Right guys?" Sora innocently turned his smiling face down to the tiny antmen.

"Right!" The tinies nodded, though it was obvious they weren't expecting such potent foot odor.

"Y'know...you guys don't have ta' take em' off....I can do it!" Sora nodded eagerly.

"If you're sure, Almighty Sora..." Monsou bowed humbly, causing Sora to blush a bit at his title.

Gripping the toe ends of the socks and cringing at how damp and even crusty they felt, Sora began to grunt as he tugged on the socks.

"Grrrrgh!" Sora grit his teeth in effort comically, causing Riku to shake his head at his friend's notoriously cheesy feet.

Even when they were on the islands where they were from, Sora's feet were legendarily big and rank (hence the large shoes he wore all the time, even the black outfit he was currently wearing from when he fought the Nobodies and Organization XIII.).

And being how goofy Sora was and how he was fully aware of his cheddar cheese feet, Riku often found himself the victim of Sora's foot-related pranks.

However, Riku smirked mischievously as a group of ant-men gathered on the armrests of his throne. Riku had a secret stinky weapon of his own after all, and as he felt sweat trickle down his sides and the dampness under his arms...he relished the thought that these tiny people would worship such a sweaty and dank area...that was also notorious for being rancid back home.

Why would he always wear sleeveless clothing otherwise?
1252222222122111121111.title: They then popped off the shoes.

12522222221221111211112.content:
But on the other hand, Riku considered to let Sora have his fun first before he decides to bring out his own stink, besides he would like the Ant-men to not be overwhelmed by the collective stink.

'Better to let them ease into the smell.' He thought to hinself as he saw Sora finally pull off the socks from his bare feet as he sighed in relief.

"Finally took these off, you wouldn't imagine how long these were on." He said wiggling his toes as the smell flowed throughout the vast room surprisingly enough.

"Well we can certainly guess." Monsou said shaking his head slightly to dispel a bit of the smell coming into his nose, the others look a bit discomforted by the odor too but didn't show it too much.

Sora stuffed the socks back into the shoes to save up space as he placed his large feet in front of them, flexing his toes idly. "So when are you gonna start? I hope its not too much for you." He asked them teasingly as he raised them up, showing his slightly reflective soles in the process.

"Don't worry Sora, we'll be on it immediately." He told him as the others nodded in agreement and ran towards the stompers and trying their best to ignore the smell, started to rub and service the foot.

"Just be careful though, Sora got some sensitive feet, might kick out a bit." Riku advised them to watch out for.
12522222221221111211112.title: Riku waits for Sora to get his socks off..letti...

125222222212211112111121.content:
Sora suddenly jolted and began to giggle like a little kid! "Hahahahaha! That tickles!" He held his stomach in laughter, trying not to kick the ant-men across the room.

The ant-men couldn't help but smile at the innocent laughter and behavior of this titan of a boy. It was much more charming than the toxic cheesy smell that was flowing into their noses.

Riku smirked and nodded at the foot servicing tinies, "Told ya..."

Soon Sora calmed down, though he still gave slight giggles when the ant-men touched particularly sensitive parts of his plump feet. Given how strong the tinies were, they were able to give a giant like Sora very good foot massages.

The spikey haired kid leaned back in his throne and groaned in approval, "Yeaah...I've never had a foot rub before! But I think I'm gonna have these a lot from now on!" Sora flexed his bulbous toes in joy, what he was saying caused some of the tiny people to shudder at the thought of being ordered to rub these very cheesy feet regularly.

Riku noticed how green some of the tinies' faces were and chuckled devilishly, deciding not to inform Sora that his feet were grossing some of their servants out.

"So...about these rival tribes and cities....if they keep bothering you or being a threat...we'll just use that thing you mentioned to grow gigantic and teach them a lesson." Riku grinned smugly.

"Yeah! You won't have to worry anymore!" Sora declared brightly.

"Imagine stomping around with those big feet of yours Sora! Wheww!" Riku teasingly fanned the air and laughed.

125222222222.title: Moving on

12522222222211.content:
Link was once again enjoying some down-time between Super Smash Brothers Tournaments. He was surfing the internet, to find some fanart of his adventures. But then he stumbled across a rather strange section of the internet, where he found some interesting fanfictions. It was the Giantess/Shrinking section; in which almost all of them, he usually ended up shrunk and at the mercy of the princess, or she or one of the other women in his life grow to gigantic size, take over the world, and keep him as some sort of slave or pet or something...

After reading so many of these stories for hours, Link actually started to get pissed off. He was initially confused; he didn't believe that any of the girls he knew were as megalomaniacle or power hungry as they were written in these stories. Nor did they seem as horny. (Though maybe Ruto and Zelda did from time to time.) Was this what they were thinking all the time though? Maybe he didn't know them as well as he thought; and these stories were clouding his judgement. But I think what really irritated him, was that the stories seemed to imply that he would be so easily dominated; like the girls owned him or something.

He knew that given the true situation, not only would he very easily be able to beat all of them, but he'd actually be the one to take over the world. He actually began to get the idea of getting a little pay-back. I mean, he spent all those years rescuing and protecting those girls, and this is how they repaid him? By pretending that he doesn't respect them just because they're women, and then treating him like he's some sort of play-thing?

Link got up from his chair and left the computer. He went into the storage-supply closet where he'd kept a few souvenirs from his journeys. He opened a chest of things he'd collected from Termina. Inside was the Giant's Mask. It had been used in a few of the stories he'd read, so maybe it would work for him now. He took it outside; knowing it was a bad idea to wear it inside of an enclosed building. After all he didn't want smash up his own stuff.

He stood outside with the mask. He figured that with his Triforce piece, he had the power to make the mask work anywhere, just like in one of the stories. He put the mask to his face. Already he could feel it's magic taking hold; he was starting to work! Before long, he shot up into the air, growing into a 100 foot giant. He looked down at himself in awe; he hadn't used this mask since he fought Twinmold. And he was just a boy back then. Now as a full-grown man, he was even taller. He smiled; now he would surely get some payback for the humiliations they enacted on him in those stories. Now he'd be the one in charge; not just of them, but all of Hyrule. But where should he start?
12522222222211.title: Link

125222222222111.content:
Link stood, admiring his incredible, gigantic form, knowing that he was a veritable Hylian God now. He wondered what he should do first; should he take over Hyrule? Or should he go show off his new size to the girls? He decided the latter would be more fun and easier. He thought back to the stories and Zelda seemed to be the main focus in those ones; he figured that the best action would be to pay her a visit. So he turned around and moved through Hyrule Fields and headed for Castle Town.

His thundering footsteps alerted the people of the market to his presence long before he arrived. He threw his leg over the gate and hopped over. He looked down, making careful considerations to not crush all the tiny people of the town. He wasn't a monster...yet.
The people on the one hand didn't know what to make of him. He was a giant and quite imposing but they still recognized him as their hero. "Don't mind me, folks," Link said carefully stepping over the fountain as he passed through the square. "Just visiting the princess." As Link watched the little folk below trying not to panic at the mere sight of him, he couldn't help but be a little bit enthralled at the amount of power he had over them. And part of him began to notice how tasty they looked...A thought for later.

He soon made it to the castle. The guards seeing him began throwing their spears. But he simply blocked them with his shield. "Guys...cmon, really?" he asked. Seeing as how their weapons were ineffective, the soldiers panicked and ran away. Soon he was completely unabated as he approached the castle walls. "Time to see my little Princess," Link said. He approached the tower where he knew her bedroom was. "Oh Zelda," he called in a sing-songy fashion. "I've got a BIG surprise for you."

Link soon saw Zelda appear from her room and walk out onto her balcony. Her eyes widened and her jaw dropped when she saw him standing there as an incredible giant. The tower she was in only came up to his chest. She was completely awe-stricken at the sight of her Hero as a gigantic God before her. Link slid the giant's mask up onto his forehead, revealing his face. He smirked seeing her stunned like this. It must've been a few minutes before she finally said something.
"Link...what have you done to yourself?" she asked.

"Oh c'mon," Link said with a laugh. "I'm just trying it out." He then gave a 360 degree turn, presenting himself completely. "What do you think of the new me, Princess?"

Link could see it in Zelda's eyes; she was trying hard to suppress the aroused feeling the mere sight of him was giving her. "It's uh...well...it's quite the big surprise alright...But why did you do it?"

"Well it's the weirdest thing; I did some searching for our names on the Internet, and I found a particular group of the fanbase that did strange artwork and stories about us. They usually involved you growing into a giantess or shrunk me down, and you'd end up playing with me. They were...interesting to say the least. But what I found puzzling was that, in all of these stories, I never once got to play the Giant. I was always small and helpless; which was odd. You know I don't like being type-cast, right princess? But more than just that, was the helpless part. In my opinion, I'm clever enough, equipped enough, and resourceful enough, that if I were to ever find myself in a situation like that, I'd certainly be able to find my way out of it...Wouldn't you agree, Princess?"

Zelda didn't quite like where his tone was going, nor the way he raised his eyebrow on that last question. But she knew better than to try and make him angry. "Well- yes, of course you could, Link. I mean, reality IS stranger than fiction right? You've clearly been able to outsmart and kill monsters much larger than you...So yes, I'd trust that in the situation you'd...be fully capable." She kept trying to make sure she said things that would please him. It was the first time she ever seemed sycophantic. Was she scared of Link right now?

"Yeah, my position on the issue is; if the situation were reversed, I'd fair off a lot easier than you would," Link said. That gave Zelda pause for a second. "I bet that you'd be the one who was completely helpless." Zelda was a bit worried; Link was feeling jilted over something that technically didn't even happen. What he said made sense, but she was hoping that he didn't become fully irrational. However, as Link pondered for a moment he looked down at Zelda and raised his eyebrow again. And then he smiled. "Hehe I almost hadn't noticed how cute you are from this size, Zelda," Link said. Zelda got nervous. "You're like a little Princess Doll." Before Zelda could react, Link's enormous hand appeared over the balcony and wrapped around her.

Zelda yelped and struggled as Link's fingers gripped her. She began shaking when he lifted her off the floor and she wrapped her arms around his wrist. "L-Link!" she shouted. "Put me down, immediately!"

"Oh c'mon Princess," Link said with a chuckle. "I just want a closer look."

Zelda began to calm down once Link had finally stopped lifting her. She peered over his fingers. "It's just...I'm terrified of heights. Now put me down! I am your Princess; and I order you to put me DOWN!"

Link raised his eyebrow again. "See? This is exactly my point," Link said. "You're...really not in any position to demand anything of me. Your royal authority is...speculative at best. The guards, who would ordinarily enforce your will, have all run away. Your castle is little more than a toy-house to me...And you are practically a talking doll...I think I'm the one who is complete control of this situation."

Zelda was now more worried than ever. Link was clearly becoming more enamored with his power, as he began to realize the complete control he had over her. He began to glare at her, in a rather dominating fashion. "Link...why are you staring at me like that?"

"I think it's time that I showed you exactly who is in charge here, Princess," Link said, giving her a rather sinister grin. "A lesson I don't think you'll forget any time soon."

Zelda was starting to get very afraid. "What are you going to do?" she asked.

Link slowly uncurled his fingers to where Zelda rested on his open palm. Zelda thought about escaping, but she was too frightened to move. Suddenly Link's other hand appeared and reached for her. Zelda tried to crawl away only to be backed against Link's fingers. And suddenly Link seized the hem of her dress. With a sudden tug, he ripped the skirt away to reveal Zelda's white stockings, garter belt, and light pink lace panties.
"LINK!" she suddenly yelped at being exposed to him. But before she could protest further, his fingers returned, this time gripping her purple blouse, tearing it to shreds, revealing her matching bra. "What on earth are you doing?!"

"Oh, you won't be needing clothes anymore," Link said, with that smile on his face.

Zelda did not like the sound of that.

What does he do to her?
